messages.title: It's common to hear that 'every vote counts' in an election.
messages.content: Here in North East Fife, it couldn't be more true. At the last General Election, just two votes separated the Liberal Democrats from the winning SNP candidate. Everyone expects another close contest this time round.
One of the key questions in this election is who can best represent our area of North East Fife in the UK Parliament. It's why I am backing Wendy Chamberlain to be our next local MP.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only two votes separated the SNP and the Lib Dems in North East Fife last time. Every single vote will count in this close race.

issues.brexitEurope: Wendy will work with Jo Swinson to work for Scotland's place in the UK, and the UK's place in the European Union.
issues.governance: stand against the division in our politics and chaos

images.caption: There are only 2 votes in it in North East Fife. Only the Lib Dems can win from the SNP here.

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS - Only two votes separated the SNP and the Lib Dems in North East Fife last time. Every single vote will count in this close race.
